column2: "So, you want to obtain a Mag license. According to the ARKS regulations, I must first explain Mags to you."
"A Mag is a machine lifeform that you can equip. In addition to helping you in combat, it can support you in various ways, such as strengthening you physically."
"You can give it items to make it grow, raising its parameters and giving it new abilities. Its form may also change."
"You can change your Mag's appearance and abilities by using items called \"Mag Devices\", which can be obtained from some exchange shops."
"That's all from me. If you think you understand what you've learned, turn in the Client Order."

"\"Mags\" are support machines that players can equip.

When a Mag is equipped, the player's parameters will increase, and the Mag will be able to provide attack and recovery assistance, charge and unleash a Photon Blast, as well as additional support effects such as occasionally producing healing items.

As you improve your Mag, your own abilities will also improve."

"A Mag cannot act without energy.

A Mag's energy is recovered when it is given an item. In addition, when a Mag's total parameters reach a high enough level, it will evolve into a new form, gaining new actions and support abilities."
